Title: I Saw the Light
Plot: Rayna takes her children and sister with her on tour in NYC, but Rayna doesn?t like the influence Juliette is having on her daughters. Meanwhile Dante gives Juliette some career guidance that helps her see him in a whole new way; Deacon?s feelings for Stacey force him to reconsider his life on the road; a hunky new neighbor, Will, befriends Gunnar and Scarlett; Gunnar is thrown by Scarlett?s hiding information from him; Lamar threatens Peggy; and Avery jeopardizes his own future.
GuestStars: Judith Hoag, Chris Carmack, Sylvia Jefferies, Susan Misner, Nicholas Strong, Chloe Bennet, Lennon Stella, Maisy Stella, Jay Hernandez
